title: ICE in handling for `ReferencePattern`s

milestone.title: HIR Pipeline for libcore 1.49 Complete
milestone.description: Support all of the patterns and features used in libcore 1.49 at the HIR level: this includes, and isn't limited to, complex match patterns, inline assembly, some of the more complex type system features such as specialization, etc.

body:
I tried this code:

```rust
fn foo(&a: &char) {}
```

Another testcase:
```rust
fn main() {
    let a = 15u8;
    let a = &a;
    match a {
        &15 => {}
        &14 => {}
        _ => {}
    }
}
```

What I expected to happen: no error

What happened:

```rust
rust1: internal compiler error: in translate, at rust/hir/rust-ast-lower-pattern.cc:33
0x11edb28 Rust::HIR::ASTLoweringPattern::translate(Rust::AST::Pattern*)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/rust-ast-lower-pattern.cc:33
0x11d8fc3 Rust::HIR::ASTLoweringStmt::visit(Rust::AST::Function&)
	../../gcc/rust/hir/rust-ast-lower-stmt.h:355
0xfb7840 Rust::AST::Function::accept_vis(Rust::AST::ASTVisitor&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/ast/rust-ast.cc:5373
0x11d6b96 Rust::HIR::ASTLoweringStmt::translate(Rust::AST::Stmt*, bool*)
	../../gcc/rust/hir/rust-ast-lower-stmt.h:42
0x11d44c1 Rust::HIR::ASTLoweringBlock::visit(Rust::AST::BlockExpr&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/rust-ast-lower.cc:117
0xfb7130 Rust::AST::BlockExpr::accept_vis(Rust::AST::ASTVisitor&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/ast/rust-ast.cc:5151
0x11d6fd3 Rust::HIR::ASTLoweringBlock::translate(Rust::AST::BlockExpr*, bool*)
	../../gcc/rust/hir/rust-ast-lower-block.h:36
0x11f2c84 Rust::HIR::ASTLoweringItem::visit(Rust::AST::Function&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/rust-ast-lower-item.cc:430
0xfb7840 Rust::AST::Function::accept_vis(Rust::AST::ASTVisitor&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/ast/rust-ast.cc:5373
0x11efdd2 Rust::HIR::ASTLoweringItem::translate(Rust::AST::Item*)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/rust-ast-lower-item.cc:28
0x11d419e Rust::HIR::ASTLowering::go()
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/rust-ast-lower.cc:79
0x11d40b5 Rust::HIR::ASTLowering::Resolve(Rust::AST::Crate&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/rust-ast-lower.cc:69
0x10b1c49 Rust::Session::compile_crate(char const*)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:585
0x10b1427 Rust::Session::handle_input_files(int, char const**)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:372
0xf59966 grs_langhook_parse_file()
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/rust-lang.cc:185
Please submit a full bug report, with preprocessed source (by using -freport-bug).
Please include the complete backtrace with any bug report.
See <https://gcc.gnu.org/bugs/> for instructions.
```
